data.text:
Bigg Boss 18: Salman Khan’s Popular Reality Show Likely to Start on THIS DATE; Check Full List of Contestants

Salman Khan's hit show Bigg Boss 18 is currently the talk of the town, gathering plenty of media attention. Stay tuned to find out when you can anticipate the arrival of the next riveting season of this reality TV sensation.

Bigg Boss, a fan-favourite reality TV show, is gearing up to entertain you with its 18th season in 2024, following rave reviews of past seasons. Expect an action-packed season with more excitement and drama to keep you on the edge of your seats. Stay tuned for the premiere on Colors TV starting September 2024, or catch the exhilarating moments on your JioCinema app.

When Will Bigg Boss 18 Begin?

The popular reality show hosted by Salman Khan is likely to hit television and OTT platforms either in the end of September 2024 or the initial stretch of October. A recent buzz from Khabri on X (previously known as Twitter) hints that the grand unveiling of the show would happen on Colors TV either in late September or at October’s start. The suggestive tweet further spilled the beans that several renowned celebrities are likely to spice up this season, boost the viewers’ excitement to another level.

Tentative List of Contestants of Bigg Boss 18

Shoaib Ibrahim, a household name for his impressive acting in much-watched TV series, steps up as a contestant carrying a wide range of fanbase on his shoulders.

On similar lines, we’re looking out for Sameera Reddy, a Bollywood actress recognized for her effortless charm, is presumed to steal the show with her large fan following, thereby making her a potent contender.

We have our eyes on Kashish Kapoor, a budding actor, expected to create a buzz in the Bigg Boss house with his striking looks and potential in acting, already causing whispers among fellow participants.

Zayn Saifi, a social media star who’s all the rage for his funny videos, might make the show a joyride with his humor and vibrant character.

Meanwhile, Pooja Sharma, celebrated for her hard-hitting roles on TV, could bring an aura of power and elegance to the show.

Indian cinema actor , Rekha, might infuse charm and curiosity into the Bigg Boss house ambiance.

Dolly Chaiwala, a trendsetting internet star, might spruce up the show with her unique fashion sense and energy.

Digvijay Singh Rathee, a businessperson and a motivational speaker, could likely stir thought-provoking exchanges.

All eyes will be on Faisel Sheikh (Mr. Faisu), a viral social media figure, with fans eagerly tracking his progress.

Fukra Insaan (Abhishek Malhan), a YouTuber known for his prank-filled videos, might infuse merriment into the show.

Sheezan Khan, a popular TV actor, might captivate viewers with his on-point interactions and charm.

Expected to contribute meaningful participation, Daliajiet Kaur, an actress renowned for her tenacity, might stand tall.

Deepika Arya, an actress and a model, might elevate the show’s aesthetics, while fans eagerly await her show journey.

Nusrat Jahan, a strong-willed actress and legislator, might instigate captivating discussions.

Alice Kaushik, a budding television star, is expected to dazzle with her charisma and prowess.

Harsh Beniwal, a famous YouTuber and comedian, could keep the audience in splits with his comical content.

The audience is likely to keenly follow Surbhi Jyoti, a popular TV actress, observing her strategy and interplay.

Karan Patel, famed for his intense TV roles, is eagerly awaited to join the show.

Somy Ali, an ex-Bollywood actress and crusader for a cause, could likely introduce a distinctive and inspiring angle to the show.

Where to Watch Bigg Boss 18?

The upcoming season of Bigg Boss, season 18, guarantees a diverse ensemble of contestants, setting the stage for an emotional, dramatic, and thoroughly entertaining journey. The show will put the participants to the test through multiple tasks, nominations, and exits, examining their grit, power, and social interaction skills.

Actor Salman Khan, famed for his distinctive flair and wit, is set to light up our screens once more as the host of the new Bigg Boss season. Bigg Boss 18 will be broadcasted on Colors TV and additionally, fans can also catch the action on the JioCinema app – thus reaching out to audiences far and wide. Fasten your seatbelts for a thrilling ride that promises a season of surprises and unexpected developments, as Bigg Boss 18 prepares to enthral its viewers.
